description: RecyclerView has no adapter attached. Occurs when RecyclerView displayed before adapter is set.
commonCauses: Adapter not set before RecyclerView visible
Fragment view recreated without resetting adapter
Async data loading delaying adapter creation
RecyclerView in included layout without adapter
solutions: Set adapter in onCreate/onViewCreated before visibility
Initialize adapter with empty list, then update
Use lateinit var adapter with immediate initialization
Set adapter in XML with app:adapter if using DataBinding
Ensure adapter set in all code paths
Use ViewBinding to ensure proper initialization
prevention: Always initialize adapter before RecyclerView visible
Use by lazy initialization for adapters
Test with slow network to catch timing issues
Initialize with empty adapter, populate later
Use sealed classes for loading states
examples: private val adapter by lazy { MyAdapter() }; override fun onViewCreated(...) { binding.recyclerView.adapter = adapter }
val adapter = MyAdapter(); recyclerView.adapter = adapter; adapter.submitList(data)
